title: Bug 114470 - Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: When using the value new Date('3/2/2005') as a filter in a table, an error message is thrown.
OB: When saving and previewing the report with the filter applied, there are errors on the report page: There are error(s) in Table: table8. The error message states: Error0: data.engine.DataConversionError (1 time(s)). The details of the error are: An error happened in data type conversion. Can not convert it to Date. Can not convert it to Date.
EB: When saving and previewing the report with the filter applied, the filter should work without errors.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the report containing table8. 
2. Apply a filter to table8 using the value new Date('3/2/2005'). 
3. Save and preview the report. 
4. Observe the error message thrown on the report page.
